Entry.title: &Date Format
Entry.tooltip: Select the format to display dates as.

Entry.title: Tray Blink &interval
Entry.tooltip: Choose a blink interval for the tray icon in case of an important reminder (Ignored for KDE Notifications).

Section.title: Reminders
Section.tooltip: Settings regarding the creation and snoozing of reminders.

Entry.title: Open &URLs when completing
Entry.tooltip: If enabled, all detected URLs are opened in the systems default browser as soon as you complete a reminder.
Entry.Property: Opens URLs of completed reminders in your browser

Entry.title: &Confirm expressions
Entry.tooltip:
If enabled, the application will always present you the interpretation of your entered expressions and lets your confirm it before saving the reminder.

If disable, this is only shown for cases where more than one possible interpretations have been found.

Entry.title: Default &Time
Entry.tooltip: The time to be used as default for new reminders/snoozing, in case the reminder is date-oriented and no time has been set. Set to 00:00 to not set the time.

Entry.title: &Predefined snooze times
Entry.tooltip: Create custom standard snooze times for fast selection from the combo box.

Group.title: Mobile Scheduling delays
Group.tooltip: Extras delays added to scheduled notifications. 5 Minutes for example would mean notifications get shown 5 minutes after the actual time they have been scheduled.

Entry.title: &Normal Reminders
Entry.tooltip:
Enter a delay (in minutes) to use as delay for normal Reminders. Extras delays are added to target time of the reminder.

5 Minutes for example would mean notifications get shown 5 minutes after the actual time they have been scheduled.

Entry.title: &Important Reminders
Entry.tooltip:
Enter a delay (in minutes) to use as delay for important Reminders. Extras delays are added to target time of the reminder.

5 Minutes for example would mean notifications get shown 5 minutes after the actual time they have been scheduled.
